Text: upload AVI not mp4 man!!!.....PLEAse eztv.....upload AVI format its better then mp4.....no matter how big the size is AVi is better.....seriously upload AVi.......
I agree, what's with the MP4?  AVI is at least as good and plays on most anything.

Geesh, people complaining about something they are getting for free...  AVI is not that great.  If you use MP4, it is more universally used.  If you can't play MP4, download VLC as it will play almost every video format.
